ModMetaData.name: Roof Columns
ModMetaData.author: bluechill9
ModMetaData.description:
Adds several columns to support dynamic expansion and retraction of roofs.
Heaviest column creates a roof that enemy raiders can't drop through. Supports power-based expansion & retraction to work with power logic mods.
Inspired by https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2809986778.
Made to work with https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2013476665
Source Code: https://github.com/ElectricChillRadiation/RoofColumns
